title: JRPG Music Pack
description: Add emotion, epicness, calm and fantasy to your Japanese role playing game with these 13 themes (divided in 123 tracks so you can create interactive music) and 6 SFX that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.
longDescription:
JRPG Music Pack

Add emotion, epicness, calm and fantasy to your japanese role play game with these 13 themes (divided in 123 tracks so you can create interactive music) and 6 SFX that will take the music of your game to new heights at a low price.


YouTube Preview

Tracklist PDF (129 tracks)

 

More about the pack:

- This pack can be complemented with:

RPG/Fantasy Music Pack Volume 1

RPG/Fantasy Music Pack Volume 2

- The songs on the pack can be used in various situations in the gameplay.

- There are a lot of songs for different locations: Village, Sea Village, Snow, Temple, Technological Place, Shop, etc...

- Every theme comes with an additional non-looped version.

- Also situable for visual novel games.

- This music tracks are perfect to set up the JRPG vibe to your game.

- With many songs on the pack there’s included a version without loop, this way you can use the tracks in your promotional videos and it will be easy to edit.

- Made with both orchestral and electronic instruments.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Individual tracks for each song so you can create interactive music
  •  6 additional music SFX
  •  Music for different locations


Number of Audio Wavs: 127

Number of Audio Cues: 127

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 21 minutes and 36 seconds

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/12aOzIZIxxfBgzpf9j-vl-WIj0HBcgTOl/view
